history.proof: split. - intros H. right. exists sc, t. split; auto. + shelve. + shelve. + shelve. + shelve. - shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
pr: protocol
I: dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop
ii: InductiveInv pr I
s1: state
t: proc this (mkWorld pr) A
sc: schedule
s2: state
q: proc this W A
pf: W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)

Goal:
pstep s1 (WithInv pr I ii pf t) sc s2 q <-> (exists v : A, [/\ sc = WithInvRet, t = Ret v, q = Ret v, s2 = s1, s1 \In Coh W & W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (t' : proc this (mkWorld pr) A), [/\ sc = WithInvStep sc', q = WithInv pr I ii pf t', W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii), s1 \In Coh W & pstep s1 t sc' s2 t'])

Premises:
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
pstep : forall (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
protocol = Protocols.protocol : Type
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
Ret : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), A -> proc this W A
Inductive schedule : Set := ActStep : schedule | SeqRet : schedule | SeqStep : schedule -> schedule | InjectStep : schedule -> schedule | InjectRet : schedule | WithInvStep : schedule -> schedule | WithInvRet : schedule
ProtocolWithIndInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop), ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I -> Protocols.protocol
mkWorld = fun p : protocol => (plab p \\-> p, Unit) : protocol -> world
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc this W A | Ret : A -> proc this W A | Act : action W A this -> proc this W A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A -> proc this W A | WithInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc this (mkWorld p) A -> proc this W A Arguments proc _ _ _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A
nid = nat : Set
pred = fun T : Type => T -> bool : Type -> Type Arguments pred _%type_scope
InductiveInv = ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv : protocol -> (dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) -> Type Arguments InductiveInv _ _%function_scope
WithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc this (mkWorld p) A -> proc this W A
stepSeq : forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc this W B) (k : B -> proc this W A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 (Seq t k) sc s2 q < -> (exists v : B, [/\ sc = SeqRet, t = Ret v, q = k v, s2 = s1 & s1 \In Coh W]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (p' : proc this W B), [/\ sc = SeqStep sc', q = Seq p' k & pstep s1 t sc' s2 p'])
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [this : nid W : world A : Type pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I s1 : state t : proc this (mkWorld pr) A sc : schedule s2 : state q : proc this W A pf : W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) |- Type] ?T' : [this : nid W : world A : Type pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid ->...-> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I s1 : state t : proc this (mkWorld pr) A sc : schedule s2 : state q : proc this W A pf : W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) |- seq ?T]
stepInject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (em : injects V W K) (s1 : state) (t : proc this V A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 (Inject em t) sc s2 q < -> (exists (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (v : A), [/\ sc = InjectRet, t = Ret v, q = Ret v, s2 = s1 & extends em s1 s1']) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (t' : proc this V A) (s1' s2' s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), [/\ sc = InjectStep sc', q = Inject em t', s1 = s1' \+ s, s2 = s2' \+ s, s1 \In Coh W & pstep s1' t sc' s2' t'])
stepAct : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (a : action W A this) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (t : proc this W A), pstep s1 (Act a) sc s2 t < -> (exists (v : A) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), [/\ sc = ActStep, t = Ret v & a_step pf s2 v])
pstep_safe : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc this W A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 t sc s2 q -> safe t sc s1
stepUnfin : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (t : proc this W A), pstep s1 Unfinished sc s2 t < -> False
stepRet : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (t : proc this W A) (v : A), pstep s1 (Ret v) sc s2 t < -> False
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc this W A | Ret : A -> proc this W A | Act : action W A this -> proc this W A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A ->...-> proc this W A Arguments proc _ _ _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this W] [A]%type_scope [V K] Arguments WithInv [this W] [A]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
proc_progress : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (sc : schedule), s \In Coh W -> safe p sc s -> good p sc -> exists (s' : state) (p' : proc this W A), pstep s p sc s' p'
with_inv_step : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (z : nid) (s1 s2 : state), s1 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> network_step (mkWorld pr) z s1 s2 -> network_step (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) z s1 s2
proc_sind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> SProp), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_rect : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Type), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_rec : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Set), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_ind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
with_inv_step' : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (z : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) z s1 s2 -> network_step (mkWorld pr) z s1 s2
with_inv_rely' : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (z : nid) (s1 s2 : state), Rely.network_rely (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) z s1 s2 -> Rely.network_rely (mkWorld pr) z s1 s2
Injection.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
Injection.Exports.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
with_inv_coh : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s : state), s \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> s \In Coh (mkWorld pr)
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
Record injects (U V : world) (K : hooks) : Type := Inject { E : world; _ : hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E; _ : V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K); _ : hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K; _ : forall s : state, Coh V s < -> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2]); _ : forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 ->...-> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step E this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2 } Arguments Injection.Inject [U V K E] _ _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
Seq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A
coh_split : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W1 -> hook_complete W2 -> exists s1 s2 : state, [/\ s1 \In Coh W1, s2 \In Coh W2 & s = s1 \+ s2]
Idle : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2
Actions.step_sem : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s1 : state) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
step : forall (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop
Act : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), action W A this -> proc this W A
Inject : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A -> proc this W A
pcat : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc this W A -> (A -> Pred (proc this W B)) -> Simpl_Pred (proc this W B)
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
with_inv_nodes : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (l : Label), nodes (getProtocol (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) l) = nodes (getProtocol (mkWorld pr) l)
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
ReceiveMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), rt \In get_rt w l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2
Rely.network_rely' = fun (w : world) (this : nid) => fix network_rely' (n : nat) (s1 s2 : state) {struct n} : Prop := match n with | 0 => s1 = s2 /\ s1 \In Coh w | n'.+1 => exists (z : nat_eqType) (s3 : state), [/\ this != z, network_step w z s1 s3 & network_rely' n' s3 s2] end : world -> nid -> nat -> state -> state -> Prop Arguments Rely.network_rely' _ _ _%nat_scope
Record action (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) : Type := Action { a_safe : state -> Prop; a_safe_coh : forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W; a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop; step_total : forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r; step_sem : forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2 } Arguments Actions.action _ _%type_scope Arguments Actions.Action [W] [V]%type_scope [this] [a_safe]%function_scope _%function_scope [a_step]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
good : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> schedule -> Prop
safe : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> Prop
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
cohUnKR : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s s' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W) -> s \In Coh U -> hook_complete W -> s' \In Coh W

```coq
intros.
split.
- intros H.
  right.
  exists sc, t.
  split; auto.
- intros [v [H1 [H2 [H3 [H4 H5]]]] | [sc' [t' [H1 [H2 [H3 [H4 H5]]]]]].
  + apply or_intror.
    split; auto.
    apply IH with (s1 := s1) (t := t) (sc := sc) (s2 := s2) (q := q) in H5; auto.
  + apply or_introl.
    exists v.
    auto.
Qed.
```
